thread.title: Gundersen Health System shares benefits of 'Dry January'
thread.title_full: Gundersen Health System shares benefits of 'Dry January'

title: Gundersen Health System shares benefits of 'Dry January'
text:
[]
Gundersen Health System shares benefits of 'Dry January'
-
- Updated
COPYRIGHT 2024 BY NEWS 8 NOW/NEWS 8000. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. THIS MATERIAL MAY NOT BE PUBLISHED, BROADCAST, REWRITTEN OR REDISTRIBUTED.
As featured on
Alcohol Change UK's Dry January campaign encourages individuals to re-evaluate habits for health benefits such as reduced blood pressure, cholesterol, and clearer skin. Participants can substitute alcoholic drinks with seltzers or involve friends for social support. Damp January offers a less restrictive alternative.
